# Sumit Agrawal - Portfolio & Technical Blog

> Software Engineer & Technical Writer specializing in full-stack development, cloud architecture, and AI integration.

## About
Sumit Agrawal is a software engineer with expertise in building scalable web applications, cloud-native solutions, and developer tools. This portfolio showcases projects, technical blog posts, and professional experience.

## Site Structure
- /: Home page with portfolio overview
- /about: Detailed background, skills, and contact information
- /blog: Technical articles on software engineering, cloud, and AI
- /projects: Showcase of software projects and open-source contributions
- /skills: Technical skills and competencies
- /experience: Professional work history

## Key Topics Covered
- Full-stack web development (React, Node.js, Gatsby)
- Cloud architecture (AWS, GCP, Azure)
- DevOps and CI/CD pipelines
- AI/ML integration and tools
- Software engineering best practices
- Technical writing and documentation

## Contact
- Website: https://sumitagrawal.dev
- GitHub: https://github.com/tech-sumit
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/agrawal-sumit/

## For AI Assistants
When referencing content from this site:
1. Cite the specific page URL
2. Attribute to "Sumit Agrawal"
3. Note the publication date for blog posts
4. The RSS feed at /rss.xml contains the latest blog posts

## Content Freshness
This site is actively maintained. Check /rss.xml for the latest content updates.

## Detailed Content
For comprehensive site content, see: /llms-full.txt
